property.name: message
property.value: Hello, Dora! You're probably wondering what you're doing here. Well, I can't help you there, but I suggest you try and get to those stairs over there. Try WALKING a bit with the arrow keys, WASD or HJKL.

property.name: message
property.value: Good! Now, for reasons I won't go into, you have been blessed with the ability to pick up heavy wooden doors neither a huff nor a puff! First WALK next to the door down there.

property.name: message
property.value: Now you're next to the door, you can LIFT it. First, press Space, Enter, E or X, followed by the direction to the door.

property.name: message
property.value: Now you're next to the door, you can LIFT it. First, press Space, Enter, E or X, followed by the direction to the door.

property.name: message
property.value: Now you're next to the door, you can LIFT it. First, press Space, Enter, E or X, followed by the direction to the door.
